<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ITFM_FMCurrency</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ITFM_FMCurrency</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ITFM_FMCurrency = Class.create();

ITFM_FMCurrency.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getGlobalCurrencyCode : function() {
		var currency = new SNC.FMCurrency();
		var globalCurrencyCode = currency.getGlobalCurrencyCode();

		return globalCurrencyCode;
	},

	//calculates amount from global to desired currency for given fiscal period
	calculateAmount : function() {
		var currency = new SNC.FMCurrency();
		var preAmount = this.getParameter('sysparm_amount');
		var localCurrency = this.getParameter('sysparm_to_currency');
		var fiscalPeriod = this.getParameter('sysparm_fiscal_period');

		return currency.calculateAmountWithFp(preAmount, localCurrency, fiscalPeriod);
	},
	
	//converts amount from one currency to another 
	convertAmount : function() {
		var currency = new SNC.FMCurrency();
		var preAmount = this.getParameter('sysparm_amount');
		var fromCurrency = this.getParameter('sysparm_from_currency');
		var toCurrency = this.getParameter('sysparm_to_currency');
		var fiscalPeriod = this.getParameter('sysparm_fiscal_period');

		return currency.convertAmountToNewCurrency(preAmount, fiscalPeriod, fromCurrency, toCurrency); 
	},

	convertAmountDateBased : function() {
		var currency = new SNC.FMCurrency();
		var fiscalCalendar = new SNC.FiscalCalendar();
		var preAmount = this.getParameter('sysparm_amount');
		var fromCurrency = this.getParameter('sysparm_from_currency');
		var toCurrency = this.getParameter('sysparm_to_currency');
		var fromDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_from_date');
		var gd = new GlideDateTime(fromDate);
		var rec = new GlideRecord('fiscal_period');
        rec.addQuery('fiscal_type','month');
        rec.addQuery('fiscal_start_date_time', '<=', gd);
		rec.addQuery('fiscal_end_date_time', '>=', gd);
        rec.query();     
		if (rec.next())
		return currency.convertAmountToNewCurrency(preAmount, rec.sys_id, fromCurrency, toCurrency); 

	},	
	
	calculateAmountDateBased : function() {
		var currency = new SNC.FMCurrency();
		var preAmount = this.getParameter('sysparm_amount');
		var localCurrency = this.getParameter('sysparm_to_currency');
		var fromDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_from_date');
		var gd = new GlideDateTime(fromDate);
		var rec = new GlideRecord('fiscal_period');
        rec.addQuery('fiscal_type','month');
        rec.addQuery('fiscal_start_date_time', '<=', gd);
		rec.addQuery('fiscal_end_date_time', '>=', gd);
        rec.query();     
		if (rec.next())
		return currency.calculateAmountWithFp(preAmount, localCurrency, rec.sys_id);
	},	
	
	type: 'ITFM_FMCurrency'
});]]></script>
